body.name: Blithe Korean Skin Care Products 6 Leaves Clear Essence for Rosacea & Redness Relief, BHA Toner Cooling Moisturizer for Face, Blackhead Treatment, Evening Primrose Wintergreen Green Tea 1.83 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 13 mins
features: Pore Refining Complex – The calming clarifying essence toner is formulated with a 4 plant complex of Evening primrose, Pueraria lobata root, Pinus Palustris Leaf, and Ulmus Davidiana Root that specialize in sebum and pore care. For oily face control, the toner for face also contains wintergreen leaf extract and has BHA properties to unclog pores and remove dead skin and blackheads.

Soothing Redness Relief – The clear essence is ideal for oily skin as it contains Erythritol which is glucose produced by yeast fermentation that provides a cooling sensation to rosacea and heated skin without causing any iritation. The purifying components of the 6 leaves assist with sebum production and acne control.

Hydrating & Clarifying – The calming skin astringent lotion contains a blend of 6 natural leaves to help hydrate and nourish the skin without leaving a greasy residue. Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) is Oil-Soluble and an organic compound that easily penetrates the pores and bumps and gently breaks up blockages on your skin. With a pH 5.5 micro acid formula, similar to that of healthy skin, the facial treatment helps maintain a healthy balance and condition of the skin.

How to Use - Either use after cleansing your face, by evenly applying a desired amount onto the skin and patting gently until full absorbtion. Or apply using your fingers and follow up with a second layer of moisturizer. This 2-in-1 essence simplifies your routine by combining your oil and pore control care toner and hydrating essence.

Free of - Formaldehyde, Silicon, Gluten, Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfates, Phthalates, Drying Alcohols, Synthetic Dyes and fragrances. Cruelty-free. Hypoallergenic tested, but still patch test on small area of skin before using on face. Safe for pregnant women.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 6 Calming Leaves - the no. 1 solution among redness reducing skin care 6 Calming Leaves face essence contains six natural leaf extracts that have multiple skin-caring benefits. Enjoy improved skin tone and texture with regular use of this unique product that provides long-lasting moisturizing and soothing benefits.

What Makes 6 Calming Leaves So Special? The 6 Calming Leaves Essence contains six-leaf ingredients specialized in moisturizing and soothing the skin, such as Wintergreen, Green Tea, Centella Asiatica, Houttuynia Cordata, Tea Tree, and Pinus Palustris. Wintergreen Leaf Extract, known to contain BHA ingredients, helps smooth out dead skin cells and remove excess sebum that clogs the pores. Erythritol provides a mild cooling sensation that instantly cools irritated skin. How To Use This product can be used in several methods: After cleansing your face, evenly apply an appropriate amount of the essence onto the skin and pat gently until the product has been fully absorbed.Apply using your fingers and follow up with a moisturizer.Apply using a cotton pad, and follow up with a moisturizer.Soak a cotton pad with the content of this Treatment and leave the pad on troubled areas on your skin to help alleviate redness and soothe skin.

Use 6 Calming Leaves with cotton pads Use the acne treatment for your face during the first step of skincare, after washing your face. For fewer irritations, pat your skin toner on instead of wiping and dragging the skin. Tip: Use it with a cotton pad to focus on calming down concerned areas of the skin. Calming Complex of 6 Leaves The Korean face toner contains 6 extracts derived from plant leaves of Wintergreen, Centella Asiatica, Houttuynia Cordata, Green Tea, Tea Tree, and Pinus Palustris Leaf. The extracts are excellent for redness relief for the face as they help soothe and calm heated and sensitive skin

SOOTHING & CALMING TRIO Blithe calming skincare line for people with sensitive skin offers Vital Treatment 6 Calming Leaves, Pressed Serum Crystal Iceplant, and Patting Splash Mask Soothing & Healing Green Tea. explore SOOTHING FACIAL EXFOLIANT WITH GREEN TEA The Green Tea splash mask is an AHA face exfoliant that helps to calm and hydrate irritated and acne-prone skin. The Tea Tree Oil helps control sebum production and clear the pores explore CALMING & COOLING FACE MOISTURIZER GEL Crystal Iceplant helps to boost the moisture level, relieves stress, and balances the skin and pores without being sticky explore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is excellent, my skin is so clear and has fewer bumps. I went from using snail mucin to this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Put this in a facial spray bottle. Lasts longer and you won't spill any. Covers surface area better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing. Just for the amount you pay I wish the bottle was bigger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but pricey
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this item about a month now. I like this product, it leaves my face soft and moist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He likes it
reviews.reviewText: Mike likes it - and he hates everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soothing and refreshing
reviews.reviewText: i love this stuff! i have sensitive and redness prone skin and this helps calm that down significantly and it feels so refreshing. love the slight minty scent. i also put it on my eyebrows after plucking them and it’s SO soothing if your skin freaks out like mine does. will repurchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not it for me
reviews.reviewText: I was using it for abt 4 weeks now It wasn't helping my redness at all and noticed that it started irritating it so I just stopped using it. Smells good tho

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023

reviews.reviewerName: I didnt receive what I order for I received something else  very disappointed
reviews.reviewText: Nothing is brighting and too small but expensive
Una esencia muy hidrantes que se extiende perfectamente en la pielVolveré a repetir sin ninguna dudaBlithe es una marca con buenos productos
Me encanta este producto. Es la esencia de cosmética coreana que más me gusta. conTiene un buen INCI.
Realmente no he visto cambios en mi piel, se necesita una crema posterior ya que cuando se seca es tirante como todos los geles. Seguiré usándolo para comprobar resultados.

Compre 2 esencias una para mi tía y otra para mi, y amabas nos ha gustado muchísimo, la marca es muy buena y nos gusta un montón, además al cogerla directamente de Amazon nos da la seguridad de que producto sea 100% original. Te deja la piel muy hidratada y revitalizada, es genial para el usado diario, la piel mejora con cada aplicación, además el bote dura bastante y el envío (como siempre) fue muy rápido. Estamos ambas súper contentas
